item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

Davidi2:

Not sure why you’d ever want to do this client-sided.

hell you could do it clientside simply by throwing appearance updates into the bytebuffer. not sure why you would want to rewrite whats already available.

item.title: [317refactor] Fake players with appearances and animations
item.dc:creator: @Past1 Past.
item.description:
@Past1 wrote:

I find this really interesting.

I know RuneRebels has done this in an interesting way, but I do think it would be brilliant having ten or so fake players around the home area to give a new server more of a community feel. You could definitely achieve a lot of great things with this at your disposal in terms of starting up a new server.

Read full topic
